ygData.subject: Re: the ring
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It is a ring of gating, and it has one charge. The annoying thing is that you need to kill things in Befallen to complete this quest, which will lower your
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 27 May 1999, Countess Bathory wrote:

> From: Countess Bathory <countess_bathory_69@...>
>
> Interesting about the ring.
> Either I heard about a different ring, or it was changed.
> Either way it sounds like a good item.
> I plan on going halfling hunting soon, so hopefully afterward my
> faction will be good enough to give it a try myself.
>
> I'll post any info that hasnt been posted first.

It is a ring of gating, and it has one charge. The annoying thing is that
you need to kill things in Befallen to complete this quest, which will
lower your faction (faction in question is 'the dead') with the very
people you need to talk to to complete it. My DE SK was able to talk about
the ring with the NPC female until I started going to befallen. Now, the
npc gives me the standard "I'll talk to you when you have proven your
loyalty" line.

This will not hinder my ablilty to complete the quest, but might prevent
me from getting it recharged. I'd have to have to turn in fire beetle
eyes, paladin heads, bull elephant tusks and kerran beetle eyes with the
same frequency I killed things in befallen just to get my ring recharged.

Does anyone have any comments, or have the same problems?

Thanks,

Loet, CT
